item.title: Config Management
item.description: Manage with ease your infratructure with Ansible and Khéops. Overview: Only uses standard tools such as Ansible Khéops is used as source of truth

item.title: Libvirt Vistualisation Stack
item.description: Manage with use virtualisation tools like if you have a proper cool. This solution is particulary adapted for SMI wich does not want to go on a public cloud provider, and wich does not want to maintain its own cloud infrastructure. Github Repo
